title: Getting started with Reddit
tags: How to get started with Reddit
description:
So, what exactly is Reddit and how to get started? 

Tried a new format in this video (wanted to do this for a long time), let me know if you like it or not, in the comments. 

Also, this is just an intro video to Reddit, we can cover Reddit in detail if you guys want. 

Special thanks

What is reddit? by CGP grey
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tlI022aUWQQ

Reddit is Improving My Life by Nerdwriter1
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pe0SmaBUZT0

My fav Reddit app for Android - Sync for reddit 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.laurencedawson.reddit_sync.pro&hl=en
